channel.title: Need Help Joining Servers
channel.description: So far I've only been able to connect to one server [out of about 20 that were online], and it only lasted like 5 minutes. Could someone please tell me if theres some obvious thing I need to change [i.e. something with my firewall]. I would really like some help. :([br][size=1]Posted at: August 31, 2006, 04:51:09 PM[/size][hr]Come on people.. This forum is for helping [notice the title]. Everytime I try and connect I get "Error connecting to server. Must be down."

item.title: Need Help Joining Servers

item.description:
@budge wrote:

dude thats waT HAPPENS TO ME JUST MAKE A THREAD ABOUT IT
